means: 使厌恶(revolt的现在分词形式)

sentence.Network_en: It was the most revolting thing I have ever tasted.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是我吃过的最让人反胃的东西。

sentence.Network_en: The smell in the cell was revolting.
What a revolting humbug the man was!
sentence.Network_cn: 那人真是个令人作呕的伪君子！

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...revolt [riˈvəult] v. 反抗；反叛；反感revolting adj. 背叛的；叛乱的；讨厌的His work involves occasional journeys.
Halloween Films 文化：万圣节电影|无忧教育 ... glued to the box 迷着看电视 revolting 令人恶心的 nauseating 令人作呕的.
中级部分一周目 ... ... revolt n. 反叛；反抗 revolting a. 使人反感的 ritual n. 正式的仪式；例行公事.
What a revolting smell !, 多么令人作呕的气味!

list.abs: armed forces 武装力量armed revolt 武装叛乱armed robbery 械劫案
农_互动百科 ... 农贸市场【 free market of agricultural products】 农民起义【 peasant revolt】 农奴【 serf】.
revolt的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... n. 习惯用语 armed revolts 武装起义[叛乱] raise a righteous revolt 起义.

entry.tran: 恐怖的;令人厌恶的;让人反感的
entry.def: If you say that something or someone is revolting, you mean you think they are horrible and disgusting.

example.ex: The smell in the cell was revolting...
It was the most revolting thing I have ever tasted.
example.tran: 这是我吃过的最让人反胃的东西。

means.word_mean: 1. highly offensive; arousing aversion or disgust;

sentences.sentence: "the idea of eating meat is repellent to me"

auth_sentence.content: I mean the people are revolting for exactly that!
auth_sentence.res_content: I mean the people are revolting for exactly that!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I mean the people are revolting for exactly that!

auth_sentence.content: For it seems that the pippistrelles are revolting.
auth_sentence.res_content: For it seems that the pippistrelles are revolting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For it seems that the pippistrelles are revolting.

auth_sentence.content: Let the church...breathe her curse...on her revolting son.
auth_sentence.res_content: Let the church...breathe her curse...on her revolting son.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Let the church...breathe her curse...on her revolting son.

means.word_mean: 极难闻的,使人厌恶的,令人恶心的

sentences.en: Have a sniff of this medicine—it smells revolting,doesn’t it?
sentences.cn: 闻一下这种药——它有一种令人作呕的味道,对吗?

sentences.en: The barracks of the government force was attacked by the revolting soldiers.
sentences.cn: 政府军的兵营遭到了叛军的攻击。

sentences.en: The prisoners are revolting against living conditions in the prisons by refusing to eat.
sentences.cn: 囚犯以绝食来抗议监狱里的生活条件。
